title: Coven Traitor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use the abilities of the role you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You will be given a random Coven role. That is your role, but you win with the Town.

> You will not gain permanent defense, even if your role grants that.

> You will not get access to the factional chat, you will also get the Necronomicon last.

> You will not get roles who can only target/affect members of the Coven.

desc:
Post 1549
*"Tell us who the Coven is!"*
*10 rockets fire.*
*"Why was this artillery piece even in the Coven..."*
